009package More_;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
013import ij.plugin.PlugIn;
014import ij.process.FloatProcessor;
015import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
016import imagingbook.common.noise.hashing.Hash32Shift;
017import imagingbook.common.noise.hashing.Hash32ShiftMult;
018import imagingbook.common.noise.hashing.Hash32Ward;
019import imagingbook.common.noise.hashing.HashFunction;
020import imagingbook.common.noise.hashing.HashPermute;
021import imagingbook.common.noise.perlin.PerlinNoiseGenerator2d;
022
023/**
024 * <p>
025 * This ImageJ plugin creates a new noise image using a 2D gradient noise
026 * generator [1]. Several parameters can be adjusted. See Ch. 8 of [2] for
027 * details. The resulting noise image is of type {@link FloatProcessor}.
028 * </p>
029 * <p>
030 * [1] K. Perlin. Improving noise. In "SIGGRAPH’02: Proceedings of the 29th
031 * Annual Conference on Computer Graphics and Interactive Techniques", pp.
032 * 681–682, San Antonio, Texas (2002).<br>
033 * [2] W. Burger and M. J. Burge. "Principles of Digital Image Processing -
034 * Advanced Methods" (Vol. 3). Undergraduate Topics in Computer Science.
035 * Springer-Verlag, London (2013).
036 * </p>
037 * 
038 * @author WB
039 * @version 2022/11/24
040 */
041
042public class Perlin_Noise_2D implements PlugIn {
043        
044        private enum HasFunctionType {
045                HashPermute, Hash32Ward, Hash32Shift, Hash32ShiftMult;
046        }
047        
048        private static int W = 400;                             // image width
049        private static int H = 300;                             // image height
050        private static int K = 3;                               // number of noise frequencies
051        private static double fmin = 0.01;      // min. frequency (in cycles per pixel unit) 
052        private static double fmax = fmin * Math.pow(2, K);
053        private static double persistence = 0.5; // persistence
054        private static HasFunctionType HashT = HasFunctionType.HashPermute;
055        private static int seed = 0;                    // hash seed 
056
057        @Override
058        public void run(String arg0) {
059                
060                if (!runDialog()) {
061                        return;
062                }
063                
064                HashFunction hf = getHashFun();
065                
066                // create the noise generator:
067                PerlinNoiseGenerator2d ng = new PerlinNoiseGenerator2d(fmin, fmax, persistence, hf);
068                
069                // create a new image and fill with noise:
070                ImageProcessor fp = new FloatProcessor(W, H);
071                
072                for (int v = 0; v < H; v++) {
073                        for (int u = 0; u < W; u++) {
074                                double val = ng.getNoiseValue(u, v);
075                                fp.setf(u, v, (float)val);
076                        }
077                }
078                
079                // display the new image:
080                (new ImagePlus("Perlin Noise Image", fp)).show();
081        }
082        
083        private HashFunction getHashFun() {
084                switch(HashT) {
085                case Hash32Shift:
086                        return new Hash32Shift(seed); 
087                case Hash32ShiftMult:
088                        return new Hash32ShiftMult(seed); 
089                case Hash32Ward:
090                        return new Hash32Ward(seed); 
091                case HashPermute:
092                        return new HashPermute(seed); 
093                }
094                return null;
095        }
096        
097        private boolean runDialog() {
098                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
099                
100                gd.addNumericField("Image width", W, 0);
101                gd.addNumericField("Image height", H, 0);
102                gd.addNumericField("Number of noise frequencies", K, 0);
103                gd.addNumericField("Min. frequency (f_min)", fmin, 2);
104                gd.addNumericField("Max. frequency (f_max)", fmax, 2);
105                gd.addNumericField("Persistence", persistence, 2);
106                gd.addNumericField("Seed (0 = random)", seed, 0);
107                gd.addEnumChoice("Hash function type", HashT);
108                
109                gd.showDialog();
110                if (gd.wasCanceled()) {
111                        return false;
112                }
113                
114                W = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
115                H = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
116                K = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
117                fmin = gd.getNextNumber();
118                fmax = gd.getNextNumber();
119                persistence = gd.getNextNumber();
120                seed = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
121                HashT = gd.getNextEnumChoice(HasFunctionType.class);
122                return true;
123        }
124}
